name: Me.E.T.
description:
Me.E.T. is an audio-only game in which the blind player communes with an alien creature through sound.

Requires headphones and a gamepad. The game needs some time to load in some things in the start screen, which is why it doesn't immediately start when you press start.

Controls

Use the four front-facing buttons and two shoulder buttons to make sounds.

Made by

Maaike Smidt - Concepting, Creature Design, Audio Recording

Malebo Botden - Concepting, Audio Recording, Voice-Acting

Nathan van Ginkel - Concepting, Programming

Tatum van Trier - Concepting, Audio Recording, Playtesting

Thomas van Eekelen (me!) - Concepting, Audio Recording, Audio Design, Programming
